Malice/ Organics/ Hellplague/ Splattercannon:

The bounty hunter dis engaged the cannon and returned it to it's 
sword state.  He held it at the ready and slowly approached the 
hostage takers.  His body continued to glow brightly, even though a 
signifigant amount of power went into his cannon blast.

<Just hurry up and help!> Organics thought as Nightlight 
acknowlegded.  She was injured, in enemy hands, and now almost 
unconscious.  Hellplague had her off the ground, her feet mere 
inches from the dirt.  Malice was on his steady advance, and stopped 
standing next to Rodimus.

The Sweep commander sneered as Malice approached.  She tightened her 
hold on Organics' neck, causing her more discomfort.  
<Soon, Unicron will have the Matrix Bearer, a new follower, and I 
will have my lizard as a pet.>
Hellplague chuckled, and leered down at Malice.
"Yes, come here.  Bow down before me, worship me, and I might spare 
your sister.  Become my servant, and all will be forgiven." she 
laughed.

Splattercannon took position behind the hostage takers, holding his 
gatling rifle ready to waste anyone who moved without permission.
